TopicTitle: KSP 1.1.3 game fails to load after updating using the patcher.

Articles.Content:
Okay, so when I updated from KSP 1.1.1 or 1.1.2 (Can't remember which) to 1.1.3, using the patcher, the game will not start. If I try to start the game by clicking on the icon, it says that the game could not preload the game manager. If I use the launcher, the launcher crashes.

This is the Windows version, and I should probably try deleting the mods, but I've got KER, KAC, and HE installed. I'm not sure if this is a mod problem or a patcher problem.

Also, I used the patcher because it was going to take eight hours to download the game again.

Any help is appreciated. Thanks in advance!

AFAIK, by my experience and that of others, it seems the patcher is completely broken as of now. When I used it the last time, the game had a bunch of random problems, like assets not being there, ships frozen in space firing rcs thrusters, and essentially it breaks your KSP. Luckily is seems to not break saves, but who know. Try downloading a fresh install and port the save over and reinstall any mods you need, and it should work.
